668 A.2d 1113
PENNSYLVANIA ASSOCIATION OF LIFE UNDERWRITERS; Albert C. Krempa, Jr., CLU, Ch FC; Professional Insurance Agents Association of Pennsylvania, Maryland and Delaware, Inc.; Robinson-Conner, Inc.; Independent Insurance Agents of Pennsylvania; and Travis B.
